Date: Friday, 8/15/1991
Subject: Progress of Eddie Guardado
Dear Sir,
Eddie Guardado is doing pretty good at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 3.99, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
